items.title: Trump energy secretary says no nuclear explosions for now
items.description: After the president called for resuming nuclear testing “immediately,” the official said the administration is planning only system tests.

items.title: Uncertainty hits after vulnerable Americans wake up to a SNAP freeze
items.description: Nonprofit groups plan to work extra hours to get food out to vulnerable residents, and local community members are also stepping up.
